onyomiExamples.meaning: words, writing, lyrics, ci (form of Chinese poetry), independent word

kunyomiExamples.meaning: language, dialect, word, words, phrase, term, expression, remark, speech, (manner of) speaking, learning to speak, language acquisition
foreword to a collection of poems, preface, explanatory notes, captions
pillow word, decorative word used prefixally in classical Japanese literature, preface, introduction
